channel.title: Latest apollo download?
channel.description: I don't want to import apollo through git. Can someone upload the latest apollo with all the libs included and everything included?

item.title: Latest apollo download?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Ashi, post:10, topic:547859”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=666765.msg4458323#msg4458323 date=1416175176]

I’m confused why you need this… GitHub has a button that allows you to download the master branch into a zip…

http://puu.sh/cTF7I/4d3c04c683.png

I’m confused why you brought that up after reading all the comments on this thread. That’s not the OP’s problem.

I thought we were on an agreement to not speak to each other. But whatever.
The source is on the github is it not? OP wants the source. So put 2 and 2 together?
Yes, I get OP also needs the libraries. But realistically, that shouldn’t be as hard as finding the source (and look how hard that was?).
[/quote]
Why don’t you give him screenshots on how to download the libs or use Maven then?

When did we make some agreement? I’ve never spoken to you properly before?[/quote]
The point of the screenshot was to show the obvious button, but apparently you couldn’t comprehend that.

Also, here’s my proof.

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:35, topic:546315”][quote author=Ashi link=topic=665214.msg4456969#msg4456969 date=1415467547]
Somebody’s on their man period. I was mainly talking about justaguy comment. Didn’t even take notice of yours.
I’ll quote you, if I want your opinion on something, k? If you see me post, ignore me. I don’t want your attention.
[/quote]
I actually do ignore your posts, even on my topics. Lol. There are just times it’s justified that I respond to you (i.e, now, since you’re directly talking to me).[/quote]
Weird. Same exact situation we’re in. I ignored you and you decided to reply to me.

K thnx bai.

Read full topic

item.title: Latest apollo download?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“Aleka, post:3, topic:547859”][quote author=Ashi link=topic=666765.msg4458170#msg4458170 date=1416105861]
Just because you don’t know how to use Maven :palm:
[/quote]

I know how to use maven. The jar I need doesn’t seem to be compatible for some reason and I’am tired of dealing with. Either help or don’t post?[/quote]

Then this shouldn’t be an issue because Apollo comes with its own pom, there should be no compatibility issues if you’re using Maven correctly.

Read full topic
